title: Flights & Flatbread with Cliff Lede Vineyards
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 15, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a rare opportunity to taste some of Napa’s most highly allocated and top-rated wines, personally hosted by Jason Lede of Cliff Lede Vineyards. This exclusive experience includes a flatbread and a curated flight of Cliff Lede wines, with one very limited pour.

Tasting Fee: $50 (Includes flatbread and tasting — note: Poetry pour is 1.5 oz)

Featured Wines:

• Cliff Lede “Poetry” Stags Leap District Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 100 pts Decanter, 98 pts Vinous, 96 pts Wine Enthusiast, 95 pts Jeb Dunnuck, 95 pts Wine Advocate – Silky, polished, and profound with layers of cassis, tobacco, cedar spice, and superfine tannins. (1.5 oz pour)

• Cliff Lede Rhythm Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 97 pts Wine Enthusiast, 95 pts Decanter, 95 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Powerfully structured with black currant, fig, cocoa, and savory depth over velvety tannins.

• Cliff Lede Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 94 pts Wine Enthusiast – Elegant and refined with cassis, blackberry, violets, and cashmere-like tannins.

• Cliff Lede Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 91 pts James Suckling, 91 pts Wine Spectator – Fresh and mouthwatering with citrus, pear, and verbena over a bright, lingering finish.

An evening of world-class wines, exquisite flavors, and a personal connection to one of Napa Valley’s most iconic wineries—reserve your seat for this rare event.
